document_data.name: ''Ongild''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Ongild''''' was a large [[magic]]al emerald, named after the [[Halruaan]] [[Ongild|wizard]] who was responsible for its creation.
document_data.History: The artifact's was last known whereabouts was on [[Skadaurak Island]] in [[Mintarn]], in the stomach of the [[red dragon]] [[Hoondarrh]].
document_data.Powers: Whoever held the ''Ongild'' [[regenerate]]d a small amount every hour. It also granted them the ability to cast ''[[delayed blast fireball]]'', ''[[prismatic spray]]'', ''[[reverse gravity]]'' and ''[[spell turning]]'' once per day.
